column4: Anyone know what this error could be from and why it causes my machine to restart right around 72 on the dmesg log? "dhco_input_option: Value 4294967295 cannot be converted to type L"
i'm not so sure about your problem, but did you try to disable dhcp ?
do you know any tool that trace every action of some application, so if it crashes the system and reboot, one can still analyze what happened?

I'm going to try that right now. I thought it was since I always have the same ip. But it must've been set at the router. I'm also having a hard time finding a config dialog for network settings in KDE 4.0. So I'll have to do it through cli.
